page.title: 05Pencoed Swimming Pool
page.content: {Pencoed Swimming Pool}was built in 1981. It was opened on November 14th by the Mayor of the Borough of{Ogwr}. It is situated on the outskirts of Pencoed on Velindre Road. It is surrounded by a Rugby Club, tennis courts and a bowling green. Inside there is a vending area with food and drink machines. In the vending area there is also a public telephone, change machine and a cash desk. To swim it costs 38p for children and old age pensioners and 75p for adults. 400 people use the pool every day and 1400 every year. Many clubs and youth organisations use the pool. It is a friendly pool with a lively staff and it is great fun to swim in.{ {
